message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $170. I think you'll find it's a great deal for its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand your perspective on the value of the product, but I believe I can come to a fair agreement. Would you consider selling the product to me for $150?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your understanding of the product's value. How about we meet halfway at $160?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose an offer of $145 for the product. I hope this aligns better with our respective valuations.
